other_tests.findings: The liver parenchyma appears unremarkable, no biliary ductal dilatation, a stable peripheral non-enhancing left hepatic lesion with calcification, small layering T1 hypointense filling defects suggestive of small gallstones, normal pancreatic parenchyma with no inflammatory changes, multiple predominantly T2 hyperintense left renal lesions, and a right renal lesion that has nearly doubled in size.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The majority of left renal lesions have increased in size and the largest right renal lesion has nearly doubled in size from 7 x 9 mm to 14 x 18 x 18 mm.
